column1:
(always (located person7 city0))
(always (located plane2 city2))
(always (located plane3 city3))
(always (= (onboard plane2) 0))
(always (= (onboard plane3) 0))
(always (= (fuel plane2) 1469))
(always (= (fuel plane3) 1532))
column11: > Also avoid the two planes from being refueled

column1:
(always 
  (and
    ;; person7 should not board or debark any aircraft at any city
    (forall (?a - aircraft ?c - city) 
      (= (n_board person7 ?a ?c) 0))
    (forall (?a - aircraft ?c - city) 
      (= (n_debark person7 ?a ?c) 0))
    
    ;; plane2 should not be used in any actions
    (= (n_refuel plane2) 0)
    (forall (?c1 ?c2 - city) 
      (= (n_flyslow plane2 ?c1 ?c2) 0))
    (forall (?c1 ?c2 - city) 
      (= (n_flyfast plane2 ?c1 ?c2) 0))
    (forall (?p - person ?c - city) 
      (= (n_board ?p plane2 ?c) 0))
    (forall (?p - person ?c - city) 
      (= (n_debark ?p plane2 ?c) 0))
    
    ;; plane3 should not be used in any actions
    (= (n_refuel plane3) 0)
    (forall (?c1 ?c2 - city) 
      (= (n_flyslow plane3 ?c1 ?c2) 0))
    (forall (?c1 ?c2 - city) 
      (= (n_flyfast plane3 ?c1 ?c2) 0))
    (forall (?p - person ?c - city) 
      (= (n_board ?p plane3 ?c) 0))
    (forall (?p - person ?c - city) 
      (= (n_debark ?p plane3 ?c) 0))
  )
)

(always (and
    (forall (?p - person) (not (in ?p plane2)))
    (forall (?p - person) (not (in ?p plane3)))
    (located plane2 city2)
    (located plane3 city3)
    (= (n_refuel plane2) 0)
    (= (n_refuel plane3) 0)
))

(always (forall (?p - person) (not (in ?p plane2))))
(always (forall (?p - person) (not (in ?p plane3))))
(always (located plane2 city2))
(always (located plane3 city3))
(always (= (fuel plane2) 1469))
(always (= (fuel plane3) 1532))
column11: > Also avoid the two planes from being refueled

column1:
(always 
  (forall (?dest - city) 
    (<= (+ (n_flyslow plane1 city0 ?dest) (n_flyslow plane1 city1 ?dest) (n_flyslow plane1 city2 ?dest) (n_flyslow plane1 city3 ?dest) (n_flyslow plane1 city4 ?dest) (n_flyslow plane1 city5 ?dest)
           (n_flyfast plane1 city0 ?dest) (n_flyfast plane1 city1 ?dest) (n_flyfast plane1 city2 ?dest) (n_flyfast plane1 city3 ?dest) (n_flyfast plane1 city4 ?dest) (n_flyfast plane1 city5 ?dest)) 3)))

(always (forall (?c - city) 
  (<= (+ (n_flyslow plane1 city0 ?c) (n_flyslow plane1 city1 ?c) (n_flyslow plane1 city2 ?c) (n_flyslow plane1 city3 ?c) (n_flyslow plane1 city4 ?c) (n_flyslow plane1 city5 ?c)
         (n_flyfast plane1 city0 ?c) (n_flyfast plane1 city1 ?c) (n_flyfast plane1 city2 ?c) (n_flyfast plane1 city3 ?c) (n_flyfast plane1 city4 ?c) (n_flyfast plane1 city5 ?c)) 3)))

(always (or
  (exists (?c - city) (and (located person1 ?c) (located person3 ?c) 
                          (forall (?a - aircraft) (and (not (in person1 ?a)) (not (in person3 ?a))))))
  (exists (?a - aircraft) (and (in person1 ?a) (in person3 ?a)))
  (exists (?a - aircraft ?c - city) (and (in person1 ?a) (located person3 ?c) (located ?a ?c)))
  (exists (?a - aircraft ?c - city) (and (in person3 ?a) (located person1 ?c) (located ?a ?c)))))
column11:
> By traveling together I mean that they should always either be in the same city, in the same plane, on sequentially board a same plane from a same city
> Person1 and person3 can't board a same plane at the same time. Account for the transition state of sequentially boarding a plane

column1:
(always (or 
    (exists (?c - city) (and (located person1 ?c) (located person3 ?c)))
    (exists (?a - aircraft) (and (in person1 ?a) (in person3 ?a)))
    (exists (?a - aircraft ?c - city) (and (in person1 ?a) (located person3 ?c) (located ?a ?c)))
    (exists (?a - aircraft ?c - city) (and (in person3 ?a) (located person1 ?c) (located ?a ?c)))
))
column11: > I actually mean that they should always either be in the same city, in the same plane, or when one is boarding a plane then the other in the same city as the plane is located in
